weapons_heroes.name: Meow Meow
weapons_heroes.function: Jinx shoots bullets in a target direction.

weapons_heroes.name: Sound Wave
weapons_heroes.function: Seraphine sends out a wave, damaging and slowing enemies hit.

weapons_heroes.name: Shield Slam
weapons_heroes.function: Leona slams her shield, dealing damage in a cone.

weapons_heroes.name: Tentacle Slam
weapons_heroes.function: Illaoi slams the ground, dealing damage and spawning a tentacle that will attack nearby enemies.

weapons_heroes.name: Pillory Swipe
weapons_heroes.function: Briar sweeps in front of her, dealing damage.

weapons_heroes.name: Steel Tempest
weapons_heroes.function: Yasuo gains flow, which increases as he moves and dashes. At 100 flow stacks, he throws out a whirlwind.

weapons_heroes.name: Bunny Hop
weapons_heroes.function: Riven passively gains movement speed and a charge as she moves. At maximum charge, she jumps forward. Every second cast knocks up enemies.

weapons_heroes.name: Guiding Hex
weapons_heroes.function: Aurora shoots a hex through the air, guiding it as it flies. Enemies take damage and are hexed. She purges hexed targets every 3rd cast of her spell, which deals extra damage.

weapons_heroes.name: Winged Dagger
weapons_heroes.function: Xayah throws out a dagger in front of her that pierces through enemies. It eventually leaves a dagger on the ground.
